title: Training Your Brain & Body to Thrive During Stress with Dr. Elizabeth A Stanley (172)
description: It's easy to ignore or not notice the impact of stress and trauma on your body, but this can have a devastating impact on you physically emotionally and also on your relationships. Guest Dr. Elizabeth Stanley knows stress reduction - she had developed a program used by the US military called Mindfulness-based Mind Fitness Training.  Co-host Dr. Ann Kelley and Dr. Stanley discuss practical strategies that will help you build resilience, recover from trauma, heal and thrive. Find show notes and more episodes at www.therapistuncensored.com/episodes.
itunes:subtitle: Military-tested mindfulness training to grow your capacity to manage stress and trauma
